articles.description:
Algorithmic trading is something that I’m incredibly excited about. So much so that I’ve spent the last 3 years building an algorithmic crypto trading platform alongside a small team of developers. After all this work, I’m supper happy to say that out trading platform — AESIR is live and growing! The app is still very young and […]
